instructor.name: Prof. Seung-Ho An
instructor.contact_policy: We will have a team chat on "Teams." If you have any questions, feel free to send me an email. I normally try to answer within 24 hours. If you don't hear from me in 48 hours, please feel free to send me a reminder.
